verbose_text: This reduced glucose consumption is a result of impaired transduction of insulin signals, such as insulin receptor substrate-1 phosphorylation, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K) activity, mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK) activity, insulin responsive glucose transporters, namely, glucose transporter-4 (GLUT4), and/or other insulin independent mechanisms [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: reduced glucose consumption is a result of impaired transduction of insulin signals, such as insulin receptor substrate-1 phosphorylation, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K) activity, mitogen-activated protein kinase
